p: The tested essential oils and their main component (1,8-cineole) decreased the production of the QS-controlled virulence factors (elastase and protease) in P. aeruginosa PAO1 in a concentration dependant manner. At 10 Âµg/mL concentration, the three essential oils showed more than 50% of inhibition of elastolytic and proteolytic activities in P. aeruginosa PAO1 ( Figure 2A,B).
